Posts.EditableText:
Hello,

On May 31rd the site play2.textadventures.co.uk stopped working. It returns an error 500 with the following message:
**Server Error in '/' Application.**

This is very unfortunate as the web riddle Do Not Believe Her Lies (https://donotbelieveherlies.com/) has a text adventure on play2.textadventures.co.uk, at the final stages of the riddle. A couple of solvers reached that level, and aren't able to progress anymore.

I hope this error will be resolved soon. Thanks!


Kind regards,

Erwin "DutchDad" from The Netherlands

Posts.EditableText: Yeah, this has been happening a lot. I was really optimistic a short time ago because saving started working again.  But after a couple of days, it broke =/
